overview: Yuko, who has no place to stay at home, wanders the streets every day and then dances alone in a nearby park. That day, Yuko wanders aimlessly through the city and bumps into a boy on a pedestrian bridge. And that night, Yuko hears applause as she is dancing in the park. When Yuko tries to run away from the boy, who she finds annoying, he says to her, "You were so nice just now.
title: 真っ赤なポピー
